career.name: Event Catalyst
career.title: Web Developer (Intern)
description: Led the migration of a web application to Angular 17, significantly improving rendering performance and code maintainability.
Designed and authored a comprehensive migration and deployment guide (CI/CD), now used as the internal standard for future software updates.
Demonstrated high learning agility by mastering the Angular ecosystem through intensive self-study to meet project deadlines.

career.name: Zenconnect
career.title: Wordpress Developer (Intern)
description: Developed custom automation scripts for secure file backups, ensuring the integrity and availability of critical server data.
Built a secure password generation tool compliant with modern cryptographic complexity standards.
Managed and enhanced digital presence via WordPress, focusing on SEO best practices and user engagement.
